div.p: Flag_of_Ghana.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 450 × 300 pixels, file size: 600 B)

div.p: The colours green, yellow and red originated from the Ethiopian flag. Permission was asked from the Emperor Haille Selassie if the colours could be used, it was replied yes but as long as the colours were put the other way round as to the Ethiopian flag (green yellow red).
Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.
